LanguageData.IsHunterGhoulDesc:
Ghouls hunt animals as hunters.
The ghoul only hunts animals that have been marked for hunting, and will not pursue targets if its health is too low.
LanguageData.HealthThresholdForHuntTip:
It's the threshold at which the ghoul starts hunting.
If the ghoul's physical health percent is greater than or equal to {0}%, it will start hunting.
